mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.student (first_name, last_name, registration_no, university_id) VALUES (#{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{universityId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.registration_no, s.university_id, u.title as university_title FROM public.student s LEFT JOIN public.university u ON s.university_id = u.id
SELECT c.id, c.name FROM public.course c JOIN public.student_course sc on c.id = sc.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
